Celestia's Challenge.name: Celestia's Challenge
Celestia's Challenge.flavor: You channel righteous outrage into your weapon, challenging your foes with the wrath of the gods.
Celestia's Challenge.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Celestia's Challenge.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage. If both attacks hit, the targets are marked as if by your divine challenge until the end of your next turn.

Brilliant Guardians.name: Brilliant Guardians
Brilliant Guardians.flavor: You create a pair of luminescent reflections of yourself that hover near allies, safeguarding them from harm.
Brilliant Guardians.effect: Two glowing duplicates of yourself appear in separate spaces within range. Each duplicate sheds bright light on 20 squares in all directions, and each ally adjacent to a duplicate gains a +2 power bonus to its AC and Will defense.
Brilliant Guardians.sustainMinor: The duplicates persist and you can move one duplicate 3 squares or each duplicate 2 squares.

Purifying Radiance.name: Purifying Radiance
Purifying Radiance.flavor: White motes of purifying radiance dance along your weapon as your strike sears a foe with the divine retribution of Celestia.
Purifying Radiance.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends). Each time the target fails a saving throw against this effect, each enemy adjacent to the target takes radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Purifying Radiance.onMiss: Half damage, ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends), and no damage to adjacent creatures.
